amendment.description: Amendment, as modified, makes nonowner-occupied commercial real estate loans eligible for the program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in part C of House Report 111-506 to make non-owner occupied commercial real estate loans eligible for the program.

action.text: Minnick amendment (A003) modified by unanimous consent.
On agreeing to the Minnick amendment (A003) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.
